name: Bat Wing
flavour: A torn and bloodied wing membrane

name: Lichen
flavour: It is pale and spongy

flavour: Stringy sticky strands, gathered in your hair

name: Eyeless Fish
flavour: Only flesh where its eyes once were

name: Geode
flavour: When cracked open the crystals are very sharp

name: Stalactite
flavour: A melted spike, heavier than it looks.

flavour: A dark chunk that blackens your hand

flavour: Strange vibrations can be felt when held.

+1 CHAOS
Swap LIGHT and DARK stats
Swap HOT and COLD stats

flavour: An elegant jewel that will devour your flesh

name: Adamantine
flavour: It contains the supernatural strength to contain planetary terrors.

name: Dragonhide
flavour: If you find one of these scales, flee.

flavour: It's missing a leg

flavour: Did someone drop their rubbish in the cave??

name: Acorn

flavour: A branch of sweet smelling cedar

name: Pine Cone
flavour: It rattles. There are nuts inside

flavour: Be careful not to get stung

name: Rat Foot
flavour: I wonder what happened to the rest of the rat

flavour: Smells like Christmas

name: Faerie
flavour: Could be a friend.. or a powerful sacrifice!

name: Herb
flavour: Could be used in a nice stew

name: Wood
flavour: A chunk of wood, great for fires!
